attributes.action: Purchase ownership via consortium to secure the future of the Amazon rain forest
attributes.additional_details: The issue of the hastily reducing rainforest  is the root cause of a lot of our current problems. Listen to david Attenborough!
attributes.background: Support the brokering of a deal for the purchase of the rain forest to secure its future and the future of the planet. Green companies like Amazon, Apple, google, Facebook, Toyota, Unilever, Gymshark I’m sure would be happy to support amd would add kudos to their brands.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
